notInChannel: You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
notSameChannel: You must be in `[channel]` to use this command
noConnectPerm: **I don't have `CONNECT` permission to connect to `[channel]`**
noEmbedPerm: **I don't have `Embed Links` permission in [channel] to send embed**
noReactPerm: **I don't have `add Reactions` permission in [channel] to add reactions**
noMovePerm: **I can't join `[channel]` cuz its full and I don't have `MOVE_MEMBERS` permission**
notAuth: Not authorized to use the command
noBot: :rolling_eyes: You don't have any cloud bots!
restart: **Restarting `[size]` bots it will take `[time]` minutes to restart!**
lang:
**Use the abbreviation after the command for the language you want** 
English - en
Arabic - ar
beingused: I'm in use in a different channel

play.playf: play the first result from Youtube
play.playurl: play the provided link, Playlist, Soundcloud, Twitter, or Insta

twitter.private: Sorry, I'm not authorized to see this tweet!
twitter.notFound: This tweet is no longer available
twitter.error: Something was wrong , please try again later

insta.private: Sorry, I'm not authorized to see this post!
insta.notVideo: This post is not a video!
insta.notFound: This post is no longer available
insta.error: Something was wrong , please try again later

prefix.msg: The prefix for this bot is : `xx`

volume.nonValidArgs: **You must choose a valid args between 1 and 150**

resume.notrequester: You are not the requester to resume

clear.toLeave: if you want me to leave the channel type `[prefix]leave` ðŸ™„

skip.notrequester: You are not the requester to skip

setname.long: **Names must be between 2 and 32 characters long.**
setname.samename: sorry, I am already use this name!

setavatar.noArgs: You should send the image or send a valid url
setavatar.toFast: You are changing your avatar too fast. try again later
setavatar.changing: **Changing ...** (This may take a while due to discord restrictions)

help.Play: Play the song and add it to queue or resume it [p]
help.Skip: Skip to the next song or any song in queue
help.Clear: Remove the queue and stop the song
help.Clean: Clean bot message and any message related to the bot commands
help.Loop: Repeat the queue or the song
help.Move: Move a song to the top of the queue or to specific position
help.Seek: Change the position of the track or to specific time
help.Prefix: Displays the bot server prefix or change it
help.Perms: Displays the permissions of a user or role
help.allow: Allow a user or role from using the bot
help.Deny: Deny a user or role from using the bot
help.topmusic: Show Must hear music in your bot or server or Lyra Cloud
help.texttoggle: Denied the bot from responding in specific channels
help.addadmin: Add admin to your bot 'You can use the main bot to add the admin to all bots'
help.deladmin: Remove admin from your bot 'You can use the main bot to remove the admin from all bots'
help.addserver: Allow the bot enter the server 'You can use the main bot to allow the server to all bots'
help.connect: Make all of your bots data like this bot except the prefix

perms.choose: Please mention user/role or type a role name!

shuffle.oneSongs: **You only have one song in the queue!**

addserver.url: Pelase enter a valid dsicord invite URL
addserver.noargs: Please include an ID or invite link

addadmin.noargs: :x: Please include an ID or mention
addadmin.add: has been added as admin to this bot!

deladmin.noargs: :x: Please include an ID or mention
deladmin.already2: already not admin in this bot
deladmin.delete: has been removed from this bot!

connect.noOtherBot: You don't have any other bot in this server
connect.botlen: Are you sure you want to apply this bot settings to another **[B.len]** bots ? type **yes** to confirm.
connect.change: Settings has been changed for your another **[B.len]** bots.

textToggle.channelsList: This channel/s is/are denied by admins
textToggle.channelRemoved: `[channelName]` has been removed from denied channels!
textToggle.channelAdded: `[channelName]` has been added to denied channels!

topMusic.topTitleGlobal: Top [count] played music in Lyra cloud bots

move.one: There's only one song in queue

share.noArgs: Please enter playlist name to share it link!

create.noName: Please enter playlist name with command!
create.exist: You can't have playlists with the same name!

import.checkArgs: Please enter playlist name and Lyra playlist link with command!
import.checkLink: include a valid Lyra playlist link after playlist's name!
import.sameAuthor: You can't import a playlist you have made!??

add.checkArgs: Please enter playlist name and link with command to add it!
add.notSupported: We support only YouTube for playlists links
add.checkLink: include a valid link after playlist's name!
add.duplicate: This video already in this playlist!
add.stream: You can't add streaming links to playlist!

add.addedMany: I have added `{0}` video/s to [{1}] from [{2}]
